API.Comments: The underlying output stream to be filtered.
Creates an output stream filter built on top of the specified underlying output stream.
Closes this output stream and releases any system resources associated with the stream.
Flushes this output stream and forces any buffered output bytes to be written out to the stream.
Writes b.length bytes to this output stream.
API.Function: write(byte[] b, int off, int len)

API.Comments: Writes len bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset off to this output stream.
